m1.name: myersjj
m1.title: The SAM Pattern
m1.description: SAM is a new reactive/functional pattern that simplifies Front-End architectures by clearly separating the business logic from the view and, in particular, strictly decoupling back-end APIs from the Front-End. SAM is technology independent and as such can be used to build Web Apps or Native Apps.

m2.name: myersjj
m2.title: Why I no longer use MVC Frameworks
m2.description: The worst part of my job these days is designing APIs for front-end developers.
